[woman] How do you know about that dream?

translation.en: -Good. -[chuckles]
-Yeah. -Good.

figured a lot of stuff out.

translation.en: Um... But it's, uh...
Look, a lot of times when people come in for the first time, their brains are adjusting for a while,

It totally works. Remember how I was telling you that
translation.de: -Das habe ich nicht gesagt... -Es funktioniert. Wissen Sie noch, als ich Ihnen von dem Mann,

And that girl was my roommate here, and she remembers the abductions, too,

translation.en: so he doesn't remember anything.

I'm not a clone.
I am my grandmother.

this will all be in your paperwork, but I wanna highlight, I-- I made an appointment for you, um,

what is-- what is your plan?

those plates put on your teeth, those-- What do you call them? Ooh, come on.
